title: Take a bite out of these Pi Day Search trends.
description: Every March 14 (or 3/14), we pay tribute to the infinite, non-repeating Pi (π) on Pi Day. And what better way to celebrate than digging into 3.14159 (or more) slices of …
author: Meghann FarnsworthKeyword contributor
excerpt: Every March 14 (or 3/14), we pay tribute to the infinite, non-repeating Pi (π) on Pi Day. And what better way to celebrate than digging into 3.14159 (or more) slices of its delicious homonym, pie?That’s clearly what people are doing across the U.S. Check out a few pie-related Search trends we’re seeing across the country:1.“Refrigerated pie crust” searches rose +250% in the past week.2. "Scotch pie" and “florida shrimp pie” are searched more than ever this year so far.3. "Pie crust recipe" was searched over 5x more than "frozen pie crust" over the past month.4. “Frozen apple pie” was the top-searched frozen pie type.5. Over the past month, the top trending pie filling is "blueberry pie filling.”6. In the past month "chicken pot pie" was the top “easy pie” recipe searched across the U.S.

html:
Every March 14 (or 3/14), we pay tribute to the infinite, non-repeating Pi (π) on Pi Day. And what better way to celebrate than digging into 3.14159 (or more) slices of its delicious homonym, pie?

That’s clearly what people are doing across the U.S. Check out a few pie-related Search trends we’re seeing across the country:

1.“Refrigerated pie crust” searches rose +250% in the past week.

2. "Scotch pie" and “florida shrimp pie” are searched more than ever this year so far.

3. "Pie crust recipe" was searched over 5x more than "frozen pie crust" over the past month.

4. “Frozen apple pie” was the top-searched frozen pie type.

5. Over the past month, the top trending pie filling is "blueberry pie filling.”

6. In the past month "chicken pot pie" was the top “easy pie” recipe searched across the U.S.
